dct_alternative_sm: Si Kiang or West River Kaukong Hu to Chowsun
dct_description_sm: Sketch by Lieut. C.J. Bullock, R.N., G. Robinson, Sec. Master and A.S. Webster, Mast. Asst., R.N., 1859. With corrections and additions from various Admiralty Surveys to 1935 ; Re-published at the Admiralty 15th. Jany. 1896, under the Superintendence of Rear Admiral W.J.L. Wharton, C.B.F.R.S. Hydrographer ; Sold by J.D. Potter Agent for the sale of the Admiralty Charts ; Reproduced by the U.S. Hydrographic Office from British Admiralty Chart with the permission of the Controller, H.M. Stationery Office and Hydrographer of the Royal Navy.
Depths shown by soundings; relief by form lines and spot heights.
Shows towns, relief around waterways, banks/islands, vegetation, various buildings (such as "pagoda," "obelisk.")
Descriptive text, such as "steps," "overhead cable," and "sand bank."
dct_creator_sm: Wharton, W. J. L. (William James Lloyd), 1843-1905
